meanings.definition: Having the strongest, most unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: The garbage can was the stinkiest thing in the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The skunk was the stinkiest animal in the forest.
meanings.sent3: Even the flowers held their noses when they passed the stinkiest garbage pile.
meanings.sent4: The stinkiest smell in the room was like a cloud of rotten eggs.
meanings.sent5: The stinkiest stench lingered in the air long after the skunk had left.

meanings.sent1: Among all the socks, his was the stinkiest.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the stinkiest smell coming from the fridge.
meanings.sent3: The stinkiest in the class was always easy to identify by the smell.
meanings.sent4: The stinkiest in the room was like a walking cloud of bad odor.
meanings.sent5: The stinkiest in the group made everyone wrinkle their noses in disgust.
